name: Portal Burglar
description:
The year is 20XX. You play as a world class criminal known for taking on the grandest of heists. You are infiltrating a highly secure storehouse. You got a tip that there are some really valuable gems inside. Using your trusty portal drone alongside some platforming, you need to get in and get out richer and safely (in that order).

This game was made by University students for a class.
